entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.11.5
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Removes streams from k8s. See #3646  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3647 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3646 (77bfb)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3645 (3686f)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3653 (e332b)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.11.6
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Supports log levels with common separators  -  by @garikkh in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3656 (90b90)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies to v4.0.8  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3658 (bc842)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3661 (2c031)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.11.7
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Uses request context instead of timeout for actions  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3663 (2d508)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.11.8
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds pwa in production mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3691 (80bbb)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes analytics tab when mixed logs are found  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3690 (792a9)
  • Fixes broken mobile splitpanes  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3692 (c1c61)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3671 (bb4dc)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3672 (19bb8)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3676 (91748)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3680 (db2b7)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3681 (e4a42)
  • Update dependency vue-i18n to v11.1.2 [security]  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3685 (fe090)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3682 (211a4)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.11.9
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Safe area styling for ios pwa  -  by @stasadance in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3693 (e0797)
  • Adds inset for left and right  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3694 (0ffdd)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps: Update vueuse monorepo to v13 (major)  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3697 (ababa)
    View changes on GitHub
